Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with small narrow-mouthed bottleneck and straight rim. It has curved walls and a convex unstable base. The surface of the piece consists of ochre paste with remnants of reddish coating and there is a painted decoration in the upper third. It consists of two bands of alternating orangey-red and wine-red circles, framed by parallel lines which run around the piece longitudinally.
